title: 06 - What It Means to Live a Life of Rest with Christy Nockels
description:
If this pandemic has taught us anything, it's that we no longer want to live hustling through our days. This friend has taught me a different way to live and I want you to be reminded of who you are and what a life of rest and peace can look like.

Find Christy's book 'The Life You Long For' here: https://www.amazon.com/Life-You-Long-Learning-Heart/dp/0593192540

Get started with Issuu today for FREE or if you sign up for a premium account you will get
50% off when you go to ISSUU.com/podcast and use promo code
MADEFORTHIS.
